bbs.dht.messaging により使用される ow.messaging のクラス
AbstractMessagingProvider
           
InetMessagingAddress
          A MessagingAddress for UDP and TCP Messaging services.
Message
           
MessageHandler
          An interface which a callback for a received message implements.
MessageReceiver
           
MessageSender
           
MessagingAddress
          Address of a communication endpoint in this messaging framework.
MessagingConfiguration
           
MessagingProvider
          The interface which a messaging provider for various transport protocols (TCP, UDP, Emulator, ...) implements.
